Teams

List Agents in Team

GET

/

api

/

v1

/

accounts

/

{account\_id}

/

teams

/

{team\_id}

/

team\_members

Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

PHP

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request GET \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/teams/{team_id}/team_members \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>'
```

200

403

404

Copy

```
[\
  {\
    "id": 123,\
    "account_id": 123,\
    "availability_status": "available",\
    "auto_offline": true,\
    "confirmed": true,\
    "email": "<string>",\
    "available_name": "<string>",\
    "name": "<string>",\
    "role": "agent",\
    "thumbnail": "<string>",\
    "custom_role_id": 123\
  }\
]
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#parameter-team-id)

team\_id

integer

required

The ID of the team to be updated

#### Response

200

200403404

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-id)

id

integer

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-account-id)

account\_id

integer

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-availability-status)

availability\_status

enum<string>

The availability status of the agent computed by Chatwoot.

Available options:

`available`,

`busy`,

`offline`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-auto-offline)

auto\_offline

boolean

Whether the availability status of agent is configured to go offline automatically when away.

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-confirmed)

confirmed

boolean

Whether the agent has confirmed their email address.

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-email)

email

string

The email of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-available-name)

available\_name

string

The available name of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-name)

name

string

The name of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-role)

role

enum<string>

The role of the agent

Available options:

`agent`,

`administrator`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-thumbnail)

thumbnail

string

The thumbnail of the agent

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/list-agents-in-team#response-custom-role-id)

custom\_role\_id

integer

The custom role id of the agent
